body_html:
I followed the instructions at https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows and I get the same error:
Could not find 'cudart64_90.dll' [...].
This bug is blocking all my efforts at using Tensorflow on Windows 10.

body:
I followed the instructions at https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows and I get the same error:
`Could not find 'cudart64_90.dll' [...]`.
This bug is blocking all my efforts at using Tensorflow on Windows 10.
